Solar made simple

simpy, setup, connect, and start producing clean energy

smartflower is a fully integrated, all-in-one solar system that can live anywhere. Designed to be a plug-and-play system like any other household appliance, smartflower makes solar simple. All it takes is a quick setup, and you'll be producing clean energy for your home or business. And if you ever have to move it, smartflower can be easily packed up and set up wherever there's solid ground.

40% more efficient than traditional solar

smartflower's intelligent tracking system makes it better than a standard rooftop system

Sunrise

As the sun rises in the morning, smartflower automatically unfolds itself. It directs its solar modular fan towards the sun and begins producing electricity for you.

All Day

Thanks to dual-axle sun tracking, the fan follows the sun throughout the day, staying at the optimal angle for energy productions, even when it's cloudy.

Sunset

smartflower's smart tracking makes the most of the sun's rays in the waning hours of daylight. Once the sun goes down, smartflower automatically folds itself back into a secure position and waits for sunrise

Smart enough to take care of itself

Expertly designed for nearly effortless clean energy

smartflower combines several smart features into one sophisticated package with the goal of maximizing its efficiency and making it early effortless to operate

Creative thinking gets noticed—our awards
